name: Dyadic
description: Two players steal an ancient and priceless relic, awakening an ominous presence deep beneath the earth, and sending them tumbling into long forgotten ruins. You both must work together to escape, yet you both want to be the one with the relic in the end. So, will you two be friends, or foes?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: 2.4GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: 2.8GHz Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Excellent puzzles and beautiful artstyle, directed by a 10/10 would bang human being. Have heard he is a handsome dragon.
